title: Decision Making Process on Loan Approval
description: Built a full-stack ML application using FastAPI, MongoDB, and React to predict loan approval decisions with confidence scores and SHAP-based explainability, secured via JWT authentication.

title: TrendChoice â€“ MERN-Stack E-commerce Application
description: TrendChoice is a E-Commerce web application built with a modern MERN stack architecture, providing a seamless online shopping experience with product management, and dynamic order workflows. It is designed to be scalable, responsive, and optimized for real-world production usage.

title: LightWeight Fitness - React website
description: A modern, responsive static website for a gym built using React and CSS. Showcases services, trainers, and contact info with smooth navigation and clean UI.

title: Bento Layout for Mobile Accessories
description: A sleek, modern web layout inspired by the Bento style used by Apple to showcase iPhone accessories. Features modular grid sections.

title: ChatBot Application
description: A small ChatBot application with responsive UI.which can tell today's date, flip a coin and roll a dice using React for frontend and Node.js for backend
